scripts.prebackend: python -m venv python/venv || echo 'Virtual environment exists, skipping creation'
scripts.backend-unix: source python/venv/bin/activate && pip install -r python/requirements.txt && uvicorn main:app --reload --app-dir python
scripts.backend-win: python\venv\Scripts\activate.bat && pip install -r python\requirements.txt && cd python && uvicorn main:app --reload
scripts.backend: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? process.exit(1) : process.exit(0)" && npm run backend-unix || npm run backend-win
